title: Approaches in early intervention
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Office of Intellectual Disabilities Services, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Early Learning Skills Analysis
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mentally handicapped children
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Developmentally disabled children
description: Episode of Series "Early Intervention Series". This video looks at the history of Early Intervention, how it provides information, support and resources to families along with individual development programs in order to promote their child's development. The different types of services are looked at as well as showing the importance of assessment. This program is one of a series on Early Intervention.
